displays.heading: Next-generation displays
displays.description1: 90° connection cabinets cut 45° In the left or right side of your cabinet and then can't connect with normal cabinet from that side anymore.

wowMoments.heading: Create a WOW Moment
wowMoments.description1: The result? A face cushion that fits you perfectly.
wowMoments.description2: Enhanced immersion with no more light
wowMoments.description3: leakage, and comfortable to wear for hours.

energyEfficiency.title: Energy Efficiency
energyEfficiency.description: Low power consumption compared to other display technologies.

durabilityReliability.title: Durability and Reliability
durabilityReliability.description: Built to withstand different environmental conditions, including extreme temperatures.

wideViewingAngles.title: Wide Viewing Angles
wideViewingAngles.description: Consistent image quality and color accuracy even when viewed from off-center angles.

fastRefreshRate.title: Fast Refresh Rate
fastRefreshRate.description: High refresh rates provide smooth motion, making them ideal for video playback.

thinLightweight.title: Thin and Lightweight
thinLightweight.description: Slim profiles and lightweight panels are easier to install and integrate into various settings.

scalability.title: Scalability
scalability.description: Can be scaled to create large displays by combining multiple panels.
